overview: Ryan Bailey's new stepbrother, Troye Dean, doesn't just welcome him to family movie night, he kisses Ryan behind his dad's back and sneakily drills his ass under the blanket. Ryan's new stepdad, Johnny Ford, finally notices what's going on when his stepson's load hits him in the face, and he's not happy about it! Ryan barricades himself in his room and fucks himself with a dildo, but Johnny bursts in to show Ryan the real reason he flew off the handle: he wanted his stepson's hole for himself, and he aims to prove he's the best fucker in the family.
title: All in the Fucking Family
